required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of HSK21542 in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Clinical Study Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of HSK21542 in Healthy Volunteers

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

collaborator.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a first-in-human, Phase I, single-dose escalation clinical trial conducted in Chinese healthy volunteers. The safety, tolerability, and PK of HSK21542 injection in healthy volunteers will be evaluated using a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial design

primary_outcome.measure: Vital signs: Systolic and Diastolic Blood Pressure
primary_outcome.description: Vital signs (Systolic and Diastolic Blood Pressure) will be collected in healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK21542）will be calculated in healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: AUC（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK21542）will be calculated in healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours after administration
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours after administration

arm_group.description: Healthy volunteers 0.5 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo
Healthy volunteers 1 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo
Healthy volunteers 1 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo
Healthy volunteers 2 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo
Healthy volunteers 5 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo
Healthy volunteers 10 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo
Healthy volunteers 20 μg/kg HSK21542 or Placebo

intervention.description: Intravenous injection 0.2 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.
Intravenous injection 0.5 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.
Intravenous injection 1 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.
Intravenous injection 1 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 2 min.
Intravenous injection 2 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.
Intravenous injection 5 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.
Intravenous injection 10 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.
Intravenous injection 20 μg/kg solution (active or placebo, 0.5-1h after standard meal). Complete infusion within 15 min.

overall_official.affiliation: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College
The Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College

results_reference.citation: Zöllner C, Mousa SA, Fischer O, Rittner HL, Shaqura M, Brack A, Shakibaei M, Binder W, Urban F, Stein C, Schäfer M. Chronic morphine use does not induce peripheral tolerance in a rat model of inflammatory pain. J Clin Invest. 2008 Mar;118(3):1065-73. doi: 10.1172/JCI25911.
